original: // in+d+ra b+h+au ti'i rim pa gnyis pa bzhugs /
analyzed: in+d+ra b+h+au ti rim ba gnyis ba bzhugs

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
analyzed: sangs rgya rnams kyis chos ston ba

original: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rim ba gnyis la yang dag gnas

original: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang // rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa'o //
analyzed: skyed ba yi ni rim ba dang rdzogs ba yi ni rim ba

original: a yig ring po las byung ba //
analyzed: a yig ring po las byung ba

original: bsrung dang lha rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: bsrung dang lha rnams bzhugs ba gnas

original: yi ge e dbyibs bzang po la //
analyzed: yi ge e dbyibs bzang po la

original: dbus su wam gis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: dbus su wam gis rgyan ba

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi nga rgyal gyis //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi nga rgyal gyis

original: dngos por gnas pa spros pa med //
analyzed: dngos por gnas ba spros ba med

original: de nyid chos dbyings ye shes so //
analyzed: de nyid chos dbyings ye shes so

original: de nas sems can don mdzad gzugs //
analyzed: de nas sems can don mdzad gzugs

original: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rgyan ba

original: k+aa li tha ma las byung ba //
analyzed: k+aa li tha ma las byung ba

original: kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku //
analyzed: kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: me long lta bu ye shes so

original: dang po a yig thung las byung //
analyzed: dang po a yig thung las byung

original: rang bzhin med de rang bzhin gzugs //
analyzed: rang bzhin med de rang bzhin gzugs

original: kun tu bzang mo nyid kyi sku //
analyzed: kun tu bzang mo nyid kyi sku

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: mnyam ba nyid kyi ye shes so

original: de yi a gzugs bzang po ste //
analyzed: de yi a gzugs bzang po ste

original: bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: bde ba gshegs ba bzhugs ba gnas

original: gnas der so sor 'bad pa yis //
analyzed: gnas der so sor bad ba yis

original: sems de phra mo so sor gsal //
analyzed: sems de phra mo so sor gsal

original: so sor rtog pa las byung bas //
analyzed: so sor rtogs ba las byung ba

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: so sor rtogs ba ye shes so

original: de la gzugs su rdzogs byas te //
analyzed: de la gzugs su rdzogs byed te

original: rnam pa du ma'i skur gyur pa //
analyzed: rnam ba du ma skur gyur ba

original: sum cu drug gam sum cu brgyad //
analyzed: sum cu drug gam sum cu brgyad

original: bzhi bcu gnyis sam bzhi bcu bzhi //
analyzed: bzhi chu gnyis sam bzhi chu bzhi

original: bya ba nan tan ye shes te //
analyzed: byed ba nan tan ye shes te

original: de ltar lha rnams bskyed pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar lha rnams skyed ba ni

original: bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: skyed ba rim ba gsungs ba

original: ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas //
analyzed: ting dzin de la legs gnas nas

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: rdzogs ba rim ba dod ba yis

original: skad cig nyid la lha rnams gsal //
analyzed: skad cig nyid la lha rnams gsal

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bskyed rim ste //
analyzed: rdzogs ba rim ba skyed rim ste

analyzed: skyed ba rim ba rdzogs ba

original: ting 'dzin de la legs gnas nas //
analyzed: ting dzin de la legs gnas nas

original: yang ni rnam rtog de mi bsgom //
analyzed: yang ni rnam rtogs de mi bsgom

original: rtog med kyang ni bsgom mi bya //
analyzed: rtogs med kyang ni bsgom mi byed

original: rtog dag mi rtog gnyis med de //
analyzed: rtogs dag mi rtogs gnyis med de

original: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal te //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni d gsal te

analyzed: dngos po mtshan mar dmigs ba med

analyzed: dmigs su med ba ngang gnas ba

analyzed: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med

analyzed: sangs rgya sems can gnyis su med

analyzed: de ltar gnas nas mngon gyur ba

analyzed: tshe di nyid la sangs rgya te
